title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format in which they are displayed differs between a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should have the same format when displayed in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a dynamic text item.
2. Insert a data/text item.
